column1: It is the contention of the  learned Counsel  for  the Respondents,  that an  area
has been declared as  a pasture  land by the Government and  it was  allocated
only  for  cattle  grazing  and  no  cultivation  or  farming  activities  allowed
within  the  said  area  of land.
column2: But  the  learned  Counsel  for  the  Petitioners

column1: contended, that the Petitioners are farmers  engaged in paddy cultivation with
the permission from the relevant authorities, within the said area.
